    • Method Detail

      • SecurityOn

        public void SecurityOn()
        turns on security functions if there is a webcam connected

      • SecurityOff

        public void SecurityOff()
        turns off security functions if there is a webcam connected

      • GetSecurityState

        public boolean GetSecurityState()
        checks if security camera functions are running
        Returns:
        - returns boolean representing if the security camera functions are running

      • SetFrequency

        public void SetFrequency(int time)
        sets the frequency of how often to check for movements
        Parameters:
        time - - integer for how many milliseconds to wait for frequency

      • GetFrequency

        public int GetFrequency()
        gets the value of the frequency
        Returns:
        - returns integer value of frequency

      • SetOffSet

        public void SetOffSet(int offset)
        sets the value of offset if there is a webcam present
        Parameters:
        offset - - integer value that will be the offset

      • GetOffSet

        public int GetOffSet()
        gets the offset value
        Returns:
        - returns offset value if a webcam is present. if not, will return a value of zero

      • SetErrorRange

        public void SetErrorRange(int range)
        Sets the error range value if a webcam is present
        Parameters:
        range - - integer that will be the error range

      • GetErrorRange

        public int GetErrorRange()
        gets the error range
        Returns:
        - returns the error range if webcam is present. if not, will return a value of zero

      • SetNumberOfPortions

        public void SetNumberOfPortions(int Quantity)
        sets the number of portions for image analysis if webcam is present
        Parameters:
        Quantity - - integer that represents the number of portions

      • GetNumberOfPortions

        public int GetNumberOfPortions()
        gets the number of portions
        Returns:
        - the number of portions if webcam is present. if not, will return a value of zero

      • GetWebCamPanel

        public javax.swing.JPanel GetWebCamPanel()
        creates panel that will show the webcam's live feed or a warning image
        Returns:
        - returns jpanel of warning image if no webcams are connected. if one is, will return live feed from webcam
